The ability to easily leave your distinct mark on a file is one of the things that makes Figma special. We'll have thousands of people coming together during Config â€“ we'd love to create a space where they can showcase who they are and how they use Figma.


During each break throughout the conference, weâ€™ll go through each step. Feel free to follow along or go at your own pace. By the end of Config 2021, youâ€™ll have a file ready to publish to Community!
